label: 講談
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: Storytelling or narration,often taking place in yose. Many featured historical plots, battle tales, tales of revenge, and the like. Before the Meiji period, they were often called kōshaku.［講釈］
